name: Moorhuhn: Tiger and Chicken
description:
The Crazy Chicken first saw the light of day 17 years ago, and has been on lots of adventures since then. Now it's back to face its biggest challenge yet: In Crazy Chicken: Tiger & Chicken, you play the hero in a fast-paced story filled with terrifying enemies and dramatic combat. As a Shaolin fighter, you must liberate your oppressed people and save the love of your life.Features
  • Action RPG for the whole family
  • Fight with a variety of weapons
  • Sophisticated skill system
  • Beautiful 3D graphics
  • Supports controllers
